edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate

Class LazyHmmManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.HMMManager
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.LazyHmmManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<HMM>

    public class LazyHmmManager
extends HMMManager
    HMMManager extension to load HMMs from Kaldi model. Initially empty this class creates HMMs on request.

        Retrieves an HMM by position and unit
        Overrides:
        get in class HMMManager
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the HMM
        unit - the unit that this HMM represents

        the HMM for the unit at the given position or null if no HMM at the position could be found
